column4: Okay, I just downloaded jdk-1_5_0-linux-i586.bin and my terminal is telling me it doesn't exist
if you downloaded it with firefox, it'd be in ~/Desktop by default
which step on the howto is confusing you?
the shell has nothing to do with the trash, tho
dude, be a lot more careful
running random commands from strangers that you're not even typing correctly is VERY dangerous
then the java instructions are wrong
because users don't screw around in /usr/, which is what the broken java software is trying to do
you complain to whoever gave them to you
what are you trying to do now?
